entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
